name: QS Discover and Connect for MBA in NYC
content: Register at this link: https://bit.ly/3wIJduY Learn more about graduate school admissions, financing options, and attend career and personal branding panels. Get a step ahead of your competition and meet admissions representatives face-to-face. You'll also become eligible for exclusive scholarships and a free professional headshot taken onsite, just for attending! The event is free, but spots are limited, so make sure to register now. Save your place by registering today: https://bit.ly/3wIJduY Time: 11:30 AM - 5:30 PM Venue Details: Sheraton New York Times Square Hotel, 811 7th Avenue, West 53rd Street, New York, New York, 10019, United States Price: Free: USD 0.00
